page.title: 02HOBKIRK COMMUNITY COUNCIL
page.content: This is a body with nine members who are nominated and elected by the people of the district to serve for three year periods.It is non-political and has no powers,except to make requests and suggestions to the Borders Regional Council and Roxburgh District Council.It was founded in 1977,and meetings are held every two months.A summary of the minutes of the meeting held on 12.8.85 gives an idea of the matters discussed. { {FOOTPATHS:}pressure was renewed on the B.R.C. to provide a footpath by the roadside from the village to both Greenriver Cottages and the school, as increased traffic can be hazardous.
